bpp/descriptor.name: Easypay India PVT LTD.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Easy Pay Incepted and incorporated to create a digitally inclusive world. Back in 2014, while researching & passionately working on the consumer service industry, we were mused with this idea of unleashing a brand called Easy Pay with strong conviction of “Organizing the Unorganized” retail sector in India.

descriptor.name: Anand Style Spectrum
descriptor.long_desc: Find elegance and style you crave. At Style Spectrum, our goal is to keep you up to date with the latest trends in fashion with beautiful & trendy designs

descriptor.name: Eyewearlabs OKNO | Polarized Full Rim Rectangular Branded Stylish Sunglasses For Men & Women | 100% UV Protection Shades | Cricket Sports Cycling Driving | Medium | Victory Lanes | Hillcharge
descriptor.short_desc: POLARIZED LENSES  Eyewearlabs sunglasses are polarized and UV Protected. Polarized lenses can filter out sunlight reflected glare, and protect your eyes from long-term damage by blocking 100% of harmful UV rays. These lenses are Anti-Glare / Anti-Reflective and Crack Resistant, and are dust repellent.Frame Material: Aluminium Material l Flexible Light - Weight | Frame Size: LargeDESIGN - Balancing classic and trendy. Ideal for men. Since they are very light weight, you will not feel heavy or uncomfortable.PERFECT ALL ROUNDER  These Eyewearlabs sunglasses are the perfect choice for Daily wear, Outdoor sports and activities such as Travelling, Bike and car Drives, Cricket, Shopping and even taking selfies. They are suitable as a high fashion accessory that adds up to your style.Care Instructions - It is important to clean and maintain them regularly. Just wipe them with a microfiber cloth to keep your lenses pristine and smudge-free.PACKAGE INCLUDES  One Sunglass along with microfiber cloth and case.

descriptor.name: Fossil Carlie Analog Women's Leather Watch
descriptor.short_desc: Case size: 28mm; Band size: 8mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal faceRose gold plated stainless steel case; black dial without date windowBlack plated leather strap with single prong strap buckle closure; interchangeable with Fossil 8mm watch strapsWater resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of exposure to water i.e washing hands or showering/bathing. Not suitable for recreational swimming, diving or snorkeling. Circumference - 175+/- 5MMWarranty type:Manufacturer; 2 Years International Warranty

descriptor.name: CARUNCOO Wood Grain Contact Lens Case,Compact Eye Contact Case for Travelling,Portable Contact Box with Mirror,RectangleCute,Colorful,Especially (Elegant Brown)
descriptor.short_desc: 1.SPECIAL PATTERN & SMOOTH HAND FEELING:Both the outer box and the inner double box are of wood grain pattern with a smooth feeling.2.LEATHER LINING & COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT:Made of leather and a soft protective lining, it is ultra-lightweight and adds minimal volume and weight when traveling or carrying it around.CLEAN & HYGIENIC:Built-in double box, one-piece clip.Clips and suction sticks are stored in separate small boxes, clean and hygienic.MIRROR & SEALING RING:The inside of the double box is equipped with a sealing ring to prevent leakage of care solution.Also we specially customized a small mirror, which is convenient to use when wearing.COMPREHENSIVE PROTECTION: Provide comprehensive protection for your glasses, protect your glasses from vibration and scratches, and provide excellent protection from scratches, dirt, impact and other daily damages.
descriptor.long_desc: 1.SPECIAL PATTERN & SMOOTH HAND FEELING:Both the outer box and the inner double box are of wood grain pattern with a smooth feeling.2.LEATHER LINING & COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT:Made of leather and a soft protective lining, it is ultra-lightweight and adds minimal volume and weight when traveling or carrying it around.CLEAN & HYGIENIC:Built-in double box, one-piece clip.Clips and suction sticks are stored in separate small boxes, clean and hygienic.MIRROR & SEALING RING:The inside of the double box is equipped with a sealing ring to prevent leakage of care solution.Also we specially customized a small mirror, which is convenient to use when wearing.COMPREHENSIVE PROTECTION: Provide comprehensive protection for your glasses, protect your glasses from vibration and scratches, and provide excellent protection from scratches, dirt, impact and other daily damages.
